products.prod_desc: A classic north Indian delight of boneless chicken pieced marinated and grilled over charcoal until juicy yet crisp, served with diced onions and tangy chutney
Whole pieces of chicken marinaded in spices and grilled to perfection over charcoal till crisp on the outside, served with diced onions and tangy chutney.
An assortment of charcoal grilled chicken legs with crispy skin and bags of flavour, served with diced onions and tangy chutney.
Delicately spiced and boiled eggs immersed in wholesome aromatic long grained rice.

Biryani Galli’s signature Chicken Biryani with tastefully marinated and succulent pieces of chicken cooked in a rich mix of long grain rice and dry fruits, delicately flavoured with authentic herbs, spices and saffron.
Tenderly cooked pieces of mutton mixed with fragrant rice and tangy herbs to give you an absolutely spicy delight.

Biryani Galli’s signature Chicken Biryani with tastefully marinated and succulent pieces of chicken cooked in a rich mix of long grain rice and dry fruits, delicately flavoured with authentic herbs, spices and saffron cooked in earthern pot.
Tenderly cooked pieces of mutton mixed with fragrant rice and tangy herbs to give you an absolutely spicy delight cooked in earthern pot.
Textured Manchurian balls made with tender eggs and cooked in a delicious and flavoursome oriental gravy.
Delicious and succulent chunks of chicken marinated in yoghurt and stir fried in a tangy mix of spices, chillies and the hero ingredient which binds it all together - curry leaves.
